TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the event that occurs when components are added to the toolbox.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreated> event is raised when components are added to the toolbox. ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs provides data indicating which component or components are being added.
## Examples The following example method returns a ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs that indicates the components that have been created:
[!code-cs[MoreEventArgsExamples#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.drawing.design._18_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[MoreEventArgsExamples#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.drawing.design._18_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[MoreEventArgsExamples#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.drawing.design._18_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent[] components) cil managed

Docs.param: The components to include in the toolbox.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets an array containing the components to add to the toolbox.
Docs.value: An array of type indicating the components to add to the toolbox.
